```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

## scatterplot

```{r scatterplot}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point()
```

### 'color'

```{r color}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point((aes(color = class)))
```

### 'shape': but need a B&W figure

Changed 'color' to 'shape'

```{r b&w}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point((aes(shape = class)))
```

```{r shape}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point((aes(shape = class)))
```
